title: 增加了一个计算列后就开始各种报错
body:
原来的语句是正常执行没有问题的，如下：
```
    <!--查询所有单据-->
    <select id="findAll" resultType="co.weiku.framework.model.DataEntity">
        select a.Guid,
               ProManager,
               WorkOrderType,
               a.Name,
               WorkNote,
               b.Name                             TeamName,
               ConstructionSite,
               a.MaterialGuid,
               c.Code                          as MaterialCode,
               c.FullName                         MaterialName,
               d.FullName                         MatStdSortName
        from RMC_WorkOrder a
                 left join dbo.SYS_OrgFrame b on a.TeamGuid = b.Code and b.ParentGuid is null
                 left join dbo.BAS_Material c on a.MaterialGuid = c.Guid
                 left join BAS_MatStdSort d on a.MatStdSortGuid = d.Guid
        where a.ConfirmUser is null
          and b.Guid = #{LegalUnitGuid}
        order by a.ContractBillNO desc
    </select>
```

后来增加了一个计算列`iif(a.MaterialGuid is null, 0, 1) as IsMaterial,`，然后就报错了，修改后代码如下：
```
    <!--查询所有单据-->
    <select id="findAll" resultType="co.weiku.framework.model.DataEntity">
        select a.Guid,
               ProManager,
               WorkOrderType,
               a.Name,
               WorkNote,
               b.Name                             TeamName,
               ConstructionSite,
               iif(a.MaterialGuid is null, 0, 1) as IsMaterial,
               a.MaterialGuid,
               c.Code                          as MaterialCode,
               c.FullName                         MaterialName,
               d.FullName                         MatStdSortName
        from RMC_WorkOrder a
                 left join dbo.SYS_OrgFrame b on a.TeamGuid = b.Code and b.ParentGuid is null
                 left join dbo.BAS_Material c on a.MaterialGuid = c.Guid
                 left join BAS_MatStdSort d on a.MatStdSortGuid = d.Guid
        where a.ConfirmUser is null
          and b.Guid = #{LegalUnitGuid}
        order by a.ContractBillNO desc
    </select>
```
**报错如下：**
> 除非另外还指定了 TOP、OFFSET 或 FOR XML，否则，ORDER BY 子句在视图、内联函数、派生表、子查询和公用表表达式中无效

**尝试1：**
看了下执行的 sql，增加计算列后将我写的 sql 放到了`select count(0) from ( xxx) `中，这样我写的语句就有 `order by`肯定就会报上面的错。于是我网上查找到了 `手写 count 查询支持`，于是定义了一个专门用于查询 count 的 sql 如下：
```
    <!--查询记录数-->
    <select id="findAll_COUNT" resultType="Long">
        select count(*)
        from RMC_WorkOrder a
                 left join dbo.SYS_OrgFrame b on a.TeamGuid = b.Code and b.ParentGuid is null
        where a.ConfirmUser is null
          and b.Guid = #{LegalUnitGuid}
    </select>
```
结果又报错：
> com.github.pagehelper.PageException: 不支持该SQL转换为分页查询!

**尝试2：**

我又把`findAll`中的 `order by` 去掉。还是报错：` 不支持该SQL转换为分页查询!`

**尝试3：**
我把 `PageHelper.startPage(pageIndex, pageSize, false);`加了个`false`还是报错

只有去掉计算列` iif(a.MaterialGuid is null, 0, 1) as IsMaterial`就没有问题，只要添加上，无论如何也不也。实现没办法了。
